entry.question: If I flip a blue hybrid battle icon, does it become an orange hybrid battle icon with the same trait?
Does the bot mode ability on Motormaster still trigger when my opponent reveals an End Hostilities?
entry.answer: No, it would be unable to trigger cause your oranges would be blues so your attack will not meet the flipped icons requirement. Note: Your own Belligerence would also cause the ability to fail.

entry.question: What happens if my opponent plays a Belligerence, I reveal DaD, and I flip a Matrix of Leadership and Master of Metallikato on defense?
